Taylor's FAQs
home / Taylor's FAQs
check our
frequently asked questions
Are children welcomed in Taylor's Barbershop if they are not getting a hair cut?

Yes, children at least 2 years of age and older are welcomed and serviced in the barbershop.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept cash and all major credit cards.

Do you accept walk-ins?

Walk-ins are certainly welcomed, however, if our clients make appointments, it reduces the wait time in the barbershop.

How can I request a specific barber for my appointment?

When you call to book your appointment, you can request a specific barber at that time. Otherwise, you will see whichever barber is available first.
